channel.title: Adding skillcapes and such?
channel.description: I want to know how to add skillcapes or even other items to my client. I know that there is an attack cape on the client (i downloaded a client, and one of the clue scrolls turned attack cape), so i searched the client folder for 'Attack' and found no item modifications. Please help :]

item.title: Adding skillcapes and such?
item.dc:creator: @bobsisland bobsisland
item.description:
@bobsisland wrote:

I want to know how to add skillcapes or even other items to my client. I know that there is an attack cape on the client (i downloaded a client, and one of the clue scrolls turned attack cape), so i searched the client folder for ‘Attack’ and found no item modifications. Please help :]
